about_the_game:
Space Cats thrusts you into the fur of a daring space-faring feline with one simple mission: Don't. Hit. Rockets. The controls are straightforward, ensuring you'll pick up the gameplay in no time, but mastering it is a whole other story. Each session is a new adventure thanks to the procedurally generated obstacles that keep the challenge fresh and engaging.

You aren't alone, however. Space cat aliens will randomly fly by. Should you collide with one, you'll get a healthy dose of Catnip. Encountering this cosmic phenomenon doubles your points but launches you into a high-speed, psychedelic state that turns the gameplay into a frenetic and visually wacky experience. It's a thrilling risk that tests your skills and reflexes to the extreme.

Crafted for players who enjoy a blend of challenge, humor, and nostalgia, Space Cats draws inspiration from the quirky side of early internet culture. It's designed to be lighthearted and entertaining, perfect for those moments when you want to dive into a game that doesn't take itself too seriously but still offers a compelling gameplay experience.

Whether you're aiming to crush your high score or just looking for a fun way to pass the time, Space Cats promises a delightful mix of classic gaming mechanics, modern challenges, and a good dose of early internet-era humor. Get ready to dodge, dash, and dive through the cosmos with the most adventurous cats in the galaxy!

Space Cats thrusts you into the fur of a daring space-faring feline with one simple mission: Don't. Hit. Rockets. The controls are straightforward, ensuring you'll pick up the gameplay in no time, but mastering it is a whole other story. Encountering this cosmic phenomenon doubles your points but launches you into a high-speed, psychedelic state that turns the gameplay into a frenetic and visually wacky experience. It's a thrilling risk that tests your skills and reflexes to the extreme.

Crafted for players who enjoy a blend of challenge, humor, and nostalgia, Space Cats draws inspiration from the quirky side of early internet culture. linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Fedora 23, or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or newer
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA compatible sound card or onboard audio
  • VR Support: N/A

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or newer
  • Processor: Both Intel and Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or newer
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required

name: Space Cats

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible sound card or integrated audio
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "Space Cats": Zip around as a space cat dodging rockets and grabbing Catnip for double points and a trippy speed boost. A fresh, funny game with a nod to internet culture, blending challenge, humor, and nostalgia.
